promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic simple lynx fire-type with ruby claws. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or fire. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Flaraxe, a gigantic simple lynx fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: ember. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word lynx or fire or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, lynx-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange galaxy background
generatedDescription: Flaraxe is an enormous feline creature, living near volcanoes. It spends its days soaring through volcanic fumes, controlling fire to its whim.
